text: Håkan Ericson (born 29 May 1960, Åby) is a Swedish football manager and the current manager of the Faroe Islands national football team https://www.in.fo/itrottur/sport-detail/news/her-er-nyggi-landslidsvenjarin/. During his playing career, he played for Åby IF, FK Kick and IK Sleipner. He is son of former Swedish national team coach Georg Ericson. ==Honours== ===Manager=== Sweden * UEFA European Under-21 Championship: 2015https://www.fotbollskanalen.se/sverige/guldtranaren-hakan-ericson- bekraftar----nara-nytt-jobb-utanfor-fotbollen-ror-p/ ==Managerial statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Team !rowspan="2"|From !rowspan="2"|To !colspan="5"|Record |- !G!!W!!D!!L!!Win % |- |align=left|Faroe Islands |align=left|16 December 2019 |align=left|Present |- |} ==References== ==External links== * SvFF profile Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Swedish football managers Category:IK Sleipner players Category:IFK Norrköping managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position Category:Väsby IK managers Category:Faroe Islands national football team managers
title: Håkan Ericson
